amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-590 to require the Secretary of Education to review and revise as necessary the regulations concerning prohibited guaranty agency inducements to eligible lenders.

action.text: Petri amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. Modification made clarifying changes to the amendment as offered.
On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
